original_text: Anyone who speaks in a different language only helps himself. But a person who speaks a message from God helps the believers in the church to become strong.
korean_text: 방언을 말하는 자는 자기의 덕을 세우고 예언하는 자는 교회의 덕을 세우나니

sentences.original_text: Anyone who speaks in a different language
But a person who speaks a message from God
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님으로부터 온 메시지를 말하는 사람은

sentences.original_text: helps the believers in the church
